Posts.Content: Sep 15, 2008 08:56PM calciumgirl wrote: I use gobs of Sebastians styling mud before I blow dry.  This weighs my hair down considerably.  After I blow it out with a round brush, I put Bumble and Bumble styling wax on it, then I flat iron it.  I wash my hair once every 2-3 days, and it helps with the pouf.
Posts.Title: Post chemo hair suggestions Bonnielv calciumgirl
